member.name: T:RestrictIp.Plugin.RestrictIpMiddleware
member.summary: Middleware provider which processes requests and ensures that only authorised connections can connect to routes decorated with RestrictedIpRouteAttribute.

member.name: T:RestrictIp.Plugin.RestrictIpSettings
member.summary: Loads settings us ISettingsProvider to configure the routes that are restricted to specific Ip addresses etc using RestrictedIpRouteAttribute.

member.name: P:RestrictIp.Plugin.RestrictIpSettings.Disabled
member.summary: Determines whether the middleware router is disabled or not.

member.name: T:RestrictIp.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.RestrictIpTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing restricted Ip route requests and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:RestrictIp.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.RestrictIpTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing by RestrictIp.Plugin requests.

member.name: T:RestrictIp.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the RestrictIp.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
